Uses of Package
util

  • Packages that use util 
    Package Description
    bank
    Bank holds all bank related classes, including payments in the form of itemized receipts.
    messaging
    Messaging holds all request and reply classes used in identifying RMI operations and all serializing.
    store
    Store holds all book store related classes: the bookstore server, books, store and carts.
    util
    Utils gathers all classes non-specific to the current business logic that deal with boilerplate or otherwise useful facilities for distributed object management and distributed transaction management.
  • Classes in util used by bank 
    Class and Description
    DistObjManager
    Each process needs to manage its available distributed objects, as well as leases on remote objects.
    RemoteObj
    Stands in for an actual Object with an object handler comprised of the host machine, an unique numeric tag and the object's classname.
    Server
    Server is an abstract class that encapsulates Catalyst context and network behaviour.
    Skeleton
    Skeleton contains RemoteObj management methods.
    Stub
    Stub encapsulates network behaviour for a stub of a remote object.
  • Classes in util used by messaging 
    Class and Description
    RemoteObj
    Stands in for an actual Object with an object handler comprised of the host machine, an unique numeric tag and the object's classname.
  • Classes in util used by store 
    Class and Description
    DistObjManager
    Each process needs to manage its available distributed objects, as well as leases on remote objects.
    ObjectStore
    ObjectStore is an interface that describes how to store and recover RemoteObj instances for project-wide consultation.
    RemoteObj
    Stands in for an actual Object with an object handler comprised of the host machine, an unique numeric tag and the object's classname.
    Server
    Server is an abstract class that encapsulates Catalyst context and network behaviour.
    Skeleton
    Skeleton contains RemoteObj management methods.
    Stub
    Stub encapsulates network behaviour for a stub of a remote object.
  • Classes in util used by util 
    Class and Description
    Exporter
    Exporter defines a single method that all objects that work on remote object exporting must adhere too.
    Importer
    Importer defines a single method that all objects that work on remote object importing must adhere too.
    ObjectStore
    ObjectStore is an interface that describes how to store and recover RemoteObj instances for project-wide consultation.
    RemoteObj
    Stands in for an actual Object with an object handler comprised of the host machine, an unique numeric tag and the object's classname.
    RemoteObjFactory
    Interface that describes how to import and export RemoteObjs, that factories of RemoteObj must adhere to.
    Stub
    Stub encapsulates network behaviour for a stub of a remote object.
    TransactionsManager
    TransactionsManager will be responsible for ensuring book buys are atomic.
